name: Mystery Puzzle Museum
description:
Welcome to MYSTERY PUZZLE MUSEUM, where every exhibit conceals a puzzle and every puzzle solved brings you a step closer to unraveling the mystery of your enigmatic host.

Come in and enjoy a challenging puzzle game from the makers of FLEETING MEMORY, FLEETING JOURNEY and DOUBLE COVER.

–

FEATURES

• 64 puzzles across 9 levels of hand-drawn art
• 10 delightful, mind-twisting puzzle types
• 87 eccentric (and helpful) characters to meet
• over 90 exhibits to admire
• a fun and easy bonus activity on every level
• solving strategies
• charming repartee
• a stuffed sheep
• witty character profiles (sheep not included)

Your tour is just beginning. Don't miss out!

–

MysteryCaper Productions. It's COMEDY SOLVED.
